name: InfoRelay Online Systems, Inc.
tag_list: cloud, colocation, collocation, web-hosting, ip-anycast, dedicated-servers, managed-services, network, bandwidth, data-centers, reston, herndon, ashburn, washington, d-c-, los-angeles, san-jose, new-york-city, dallas, la, internet
overview:
InfoRelay is a national colocation provider that serves over 200,000 Internet clients across 13 data centers in 5 markets within the U.S.. InfoRelay serves of government, small, medium, and enterprise clientele across a wide variety of products aimed at robust connectivity, information security and protection, as well as disaster recovery planning.

Founded in 1995, at the beginning of the Internet boom, InfoRelay has survived various tech bubbles over the last 3 decades and has continually remained a profitable and stable privately held company. InfoRelay was recently named as Inc’s fastest growing colocation company on the 5000 list for 2011 with 3 years of consecutive growth exceeding 200% in revenues, and within the top 200 of managed services companies across the U.S..

InfoRelay combines industry best practices, partnerships with industry leaders, and hires top shelf talent to bring a reliable colocation solution with well designed processes. The InfoRelay portfolio of over 18 data center locations throughout the U.S. are SAS Type II and SSAE 16 certified, meaning our operations are well documented and available under non-disclosure. To cater to broad range of diverse health care clients, InfoRelay employees are also trained to be familiar with HIPPA compliance and disclosure. Our documentation, operational procedures, industry thought leadership, and internal policy enforcement is the backbone of our stability as a managed services colocation provider.
